BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No. C 170352 PQK submitted by the New York City Office of Emergency Management and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the site selection and acquisition of property located at 930 Flushing Avenue (Block 3140, Lot 1), for use as a warehouse and ancillary office space, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 4, Council District 34.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
